Question: GARMIN International Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Garmin International Inc.

Venu 3

- Best of Innovation Winner, Sports & Fitness Category Honoree, Accessibility Category Honoree
- AMOLED touchscreen display
- 24/7 health metrics, Body Battery™, personalized sleep coaching
- Large Font Mode, built-in speaker and microphone

MARQ Golfer—Carbon Edition

- Wearable Technologies Category Honoree
- Machined from 130 layers of Fused Carbon Fiber™
- AMOLED touchscreen display, domed sapphire lens
- More than 43,000 preloaded golf courses, Virtual Caddie, PlaysLike distance

epix Pro

- Wearable Technologies Category Honoree
- Crystal-clear AMOLED touchscreen display
- Exceptional battery life up to 31 days in smartwatch mode
- Optimized heart rate sensor, preloaded activities, premium mapping features

Garmin Autoland - Autonomous Aircraft Landing System Retrofit

- Vehicle Tech & Advanced Mobility Category Honoree
- World's first certified system to autonomously control and land an aircraft
- Activates during emergency situations, calculates flight path, initiates approach, and lands the aircraft autonomously
Summary_cn:
佳明国际有限公司。

Venu 3

- 获奖最佳创新奖，体育与健身类别荣誉获奖，无障碍类别荣誉获奖
- AMOLED触摸屏显示
- 24/7全天候健康指标，Body Battery™，个性化睡眠辅导
- 大字体模式，内置扬声器和麦克风

MARQ Golfer—碳纤维版

- 可穿戴技术类别荣誉获奖
- 由130层复合碳纤维制成
- AMOLED触摸屏显示，弧形蓝宝石镜片
- 超过43,000个预装高尔夫球场，虚拟球童，PlaysLike距离

epix Pro

- 可穿戴技术类别荣誉获奖
- 清晰明亮的AMOLED触摸屏显示
- 强大续航电池寿命，智能手表模式可以达到31天
- 优化心率传感器，预装活动，高级地图功能

Garmin Autoland - 无人驾驶飞机降落系统改装

- 车辆技术与先进移动技术类别荣誉获奖
- 世界上第一个获得认证的自主控制和降落飞机的系统
- 在紧急情况下激活，计算飞行路径，发起进场，并自主降落飞机
